name: Leaflet.circle.topolygon
tagline: Method for interpolating L.Circle into a set of points, for example for use in GeoJSON
body:
## Leaflet.Circle.toPolygon

## Drop in
```
<script type="text/javascript" src="path/to/leaflet.circle.topolygon-min.js"></script>
```
### Usage

```javascript
var map = L.map(...);
var circle  = new L.Circle(coords, radius).addTo(map);
var polygon = new L.Polygon(circle.toPolygon()).addTo(map);
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
